Sandman Cometh: It's become such a classic that Adam Sandler has updated it several times, with fresh examples of Jewish celebs swapped in for each new version. But the original still holds up as a gem: David Lee Roth , lights the menorah/So do Kirk Douglas , James Caan and the late Dinah Shore-a!/ Guess who eats together at the Carnegie Deli?/ Bowser from Sha Na Na and Arthur Fonzarelli!/ Paul Newman 's half Jewish and Goldie Hawn 's half, too/Put them together: What a fine-looking Jew!
